function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"High rate of virus positivity from floor swab samples in icu and gw, indicating contamination of the built environment.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High rate of virus positivity on surfaces frequently touched by medical staff or patients, such as computer mice, trash cans, handrails, and doorknobs.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High rate of virus positivity on patient masks due to exhaled droplets and oral secretions.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of partition in cubicles allowing direct transmission of aerosols between occupants","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High rates of positivity for sars-cov-2 aerosol exposure in air and swab samples","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Detection of sars-cov-2 aerosol at all sampling sites, including near air outlets and in patients’ rooms","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High concentration of virus-laden aerosols near patients and downstream from patients","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sars-cov-2 aerosol distribution indicates a potential transmission distance of 4m","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Greater contamination of icu environment compared to general wards","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of personal protective equipment and professional training for family members leading to familial cluster infections.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Widespread contamination of air and object surfaces in covid-19 wards by sars-cov-2.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty about the minimal infectious dose and aerosol transmission distance of sars-cov-2.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Human exposure to raccoon feces contaminated with baylisascaris procyonis eggs","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of effective treatment for baylisascariasis","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of information about survival of b. procyonis eggs and disinfection techniques","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of respiratory droplets carrying sars-cov-2 prompted by airflow generated by air-conditioning.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Aerosol transmission via central air supply or drainage system in confined spaces.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Guidelines for air-conditioning and ventilation systems may not adequately address the transmission mechanism of sars-cov-2, leading to ineffective measures.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission through respiratory droplets and airborne particles","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential airborne transmission in specific situations","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Survival of sars-cov-2 in the air and on indoor surfaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of sars-cov-2 through ventilation ducts","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fecal-oral transmission of sars-cov-2","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient outdoor air ventilation in building ventilation systems","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor air filtration in building ventilation systems","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation system operation hours","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cross-infection due to the supply of recirculated air in buildings with centralized air-conditioning systems","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate control of temperature and humidity in buildings leading to increased transmission of infectious organisms","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of infection control strategies in the early stages of building design","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to strictly implement the latest published standards and guidelines by ashrae","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation leading to airborne transmission of sars-cov-2","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of air handling units with recirculation and inadequate filtration","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Turning off toilet ventilation systems during the outbreak","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sars-cov-2 stability at different temperatures and humidity levels","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of high relative humidity and low humidity levels","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Leakages in heat recovery equipment leading to higher air leakage rates","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of respiratory protection during filter replacement and maintenance work","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Open windows in toilets leading to improper pressure differentials and potential spread of airborne contaminants","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and outdoor air circulation","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of in-duct uv-c devices and ozone-emitting devices","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper operation of hvac systems and maintenance of pressure differentials","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Continuous operation of toilet exhaust system","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Closing the toilet window to maintain negative pressure","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Temperature and humidity control","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of proper ventilation in rooms with centralized outdoor air systems and no floor-centralized exhaust system","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation in rooms without openable exterior windows and exhaust ventilation","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Toilet lid being left open during flushing","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate heat recovery equipment leading to improper air pressure differentials and ventilation.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"}]}
